name: src/core/Action.js
content:
/**
 * An enumeration of control actions.
 *
 * This enum can be used to bind keys to specific control actions.
 *
 * @type {Object}
 * @property {Number} MOVE_FORWARD - Move forward.
 * @property {Number} MOVE_LEFT - Move left.
 * @property {Number} MOVE_BACKWARD - Move backward.
 * @property {Number} MOVE_RIGHT - Move right.
 * @property {Number} MOVE_DOWN - Move down.
 * @property {Number} MOVE_UP - Move up.
 * @property {Number} ZOOM_OUT - Zoom out.
 * @property {Number} ZOOM_IN - Zoom in.
 */

export const Action = {

	MOVE_FORWARD: 0,
	MOVE_LEFT: 1,
	MOVE_BACKWARD: 2,
	MOVE_RIGHT: 3,
	MOVE_DOWN: 4,
	MOVE_UP: 5,
	ZOOM_OUT: 6,
	ZOOM_IN: 7

};

name: Action
description:
An enumeration of control actions.

This enum can be used to bind keys to specific control actions.

description: Handles touch start and end events.

params.name: pressed

name: handlePointerLockEvent
description: Enables or disables controls based on the pointer lock state.

name: update
description:
Updates movement and rotation calculations based on time.

This method should be called before a new frame is rendered.

params.name: delta
params.description: The time since the last update in seconds.

params.name: locked
params.description: Whether the pointer should be locked.

params.name: enabled
params.description: Whether the controls should be enabled or disabled.

name: dispose
description: Removes all event listeners and unlocks the pointer.

name: src/input/KeyCode.js
content:
/**
 * A handler for the KeyCode Proxy.
 *
 * @type {Object}
 * @private
 */

const KeyCodeHandler = {

	/**
	 * Handles key code lookups.
	 *
	 * @param {Object} target - The KeyCode enumeration.
	 * @param {String} name - A potential key code identifier.
	 * @return {Number} A key code.
	 */

	get(target, name) {

		return (name in target) ?
			target[name] : (name.length === 1) ?
				name.toUpperCase().charCodeAt(0) : undefined;

	}

};

/**
 * An enumeration of key codes.
 *
 * Special keys are listed explicitly. Simple character keys [A-Z] are computed
 * on demand. For instance, `KeyCode.A` will return the key code for the A key.
 *
 * @type {Object}
 * @property {Number} BACKSPACE - Backspace key.
 * @property {Number} TAB - Tab key.
 * @property {Number} ENTER - Enter key.
 * @property {Number} SHIFT - Shift key.
 * @property {Number} CTRL - Control key.
 * @property {Number} ALT - Alt key.
 * @property {Number} PAUSE - Pause key.
 * @property {Number} CAPS_LOCK - Caps lock key.
 * @property {Number} ESCAPE - Escape key.
 * @property {Number} SPACE - Space bar.
 * @property {Number} PAGE_UP - Page up key.
 * @property {Number} PAGE_DOWN - Page down key.
 * @property {Number} END - End key.
 * @property {Number} HOME - Home key.
 * @property {Number} LEFT - Left arrow key.
 * @property {Number} UP - Up arrow key.
 * @property {Number} RIGHT - Right arrow key.
 * @property {Number} DOWN - Down arrow key.
 * @property {Number} INSERT - Insert key.
 * @property {Number} DELETE - Delete key.
 * @property {Number} META_LEFT - Left OS key.
 * @property {Number} META_RIGHT - Right OS key.
 * @property {Number} SELECT - Select key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_0 - Numpad 0 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_1 - Numpad 1 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_2 - Numpad 2 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_3 - Numpad 3 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_4 - Numpad 4 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_5 - Numpad 5 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_6 - Numpad 6 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_7 - Numpad 7 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_8 - Numpad 8 key.
 * @property {Number} NUMPAD_9 - Numpad 9 key.
 * @property {Number} MULTIPLY - Multiply key.
 * @property {Number} ADD - Add key.
 * @property {Number} SUBTRACT - Subtract key.
 * @property {Number} DECIMAL_POINT - Decimal point key.
 * @property {Number} DIVIDE - Divide key.
 * @property {Number} F1 - F1 key.
 * @property {Number} F2 - F2 key.
 * @property {Number} F3 - F3 key.
 * @property {Number} F4 - F4 key.
 * @property {Number} F5 - F5 key.
 * @property {Number} F6 - F6 key.
 * @property {Number} F7 - F7 key.
 * @property {Number} F8 - F8 key.
 * @property {Number} F9 - F9 key.
 * @property {Number} F10 - F10 key.
 * @property {Number} F11 - F11 key.
 * @property {Number} F12 - F12 key.
 * @property {Number} NUM_LOCK - Num lock key.
 * @property {Number} SCROLL_LOCK - Scroll lock key.
 * @property {Number} SEMICOLON - Semicolon key.
 * @property {Number} EQUAL_SIGN - Equal sign key.
 * @property {Number} COMMA - Comma key.
 * @property {Number} DASH - Dash key.
 * @property {Number} PERIOD - Period key.
 * @property {Number} FORWARD_SLASH - Forward slash key.
 * @property {Number} GRAVE_ACCENT - Grave accent key.
 * @property {Number} OPEN_BRACKET - Open bracket key.
 * @property {Number} BACK_SLASH - Back slash key.
 * @property {Number} CLOSE_BRACKET - Close bracket key.
 * @property {Number} SINGLE_QUOTE - Single quote key.
 */

export const KeyCode = new Proxy({

	BACKSPACE: 8,
	TAB: 9,
	ENTER: 13,

	SHIFT: 16,
	CTRL: 17,
	ALT: 18,

	PAUSE: 19,
	CAPS_LOCK: 20,
	ESCAPE: 27,

	SPACE: 32,
	PAGE_UP: 33,
	PAGE_DOWN: 34,
	END: 35,
	HOME: 36,
	LEFT: 37,
	UP: 38,
	RIGHT: 39,
	DOWN: 40,

	INSERT: 45,
	DELETE: 46,

	META_LEFT: 91,
	META_RIGHT: 92,
	SELECT: 93,

	NUMPAD_0: 96,
	NUMPAD_1: 97,
	NUMPAD_2: 98,
	NUMPAD_3: 99,
	NUMPAD_4: 100,
	NUMPAD_5: 101,
	NUMPAD_6: 102,
	NUMPAD_7: 103,
	NUMPAD_8: 104,
	NUMPAD_9: 105,
	MULTIPLY: 106,
	ADD: 107,
	SUBTRACT: 109,
	DECIMAL_POINT: 110,
	DIVIDE: 111,

	F1: 112,
	F2: 113,
	F3: 114,
	F4: 115,
	F5: 116,
	F6: 117,
	F7: 118,
	F8: 119,
	F9: 120,
	F10: 121,
	F11: 122,
	F12: 123,

	NUM_LOCK: 144,
	SCROLL_LOCK: 145,

	SEMICOLON: 186,
	EQUAL_SIGN: 187,
	COMMA: 188,
	DASH: 189,
	PERIOD: 190,
	FORWARD_SLASH: 191,
	GRAVE_ACCENT: 192,

	OPEN_BRACKET: 219,
	BACK_SLASH: 220,
	CLOSE_BRACKET: 221,
	SINGLE_QUOTE: 222

}, KeyCodeHandler);

name: KeyCodeHandler
description: A handler for the KeyCode Proxy.

name: KeyCode
description:
An enumeration of key codes.

Special keys are listed explicitly. Simple character keys [A-Z] are computed
on demand. For instance, `KeyCode.A` will return the key code for the A key.

orbit

Indicates whether third person perspective is active.

Should not be modified directly. See {@link DeltaControls#setOrbit}.

name: src/settings/index.js
src/settings/KeyBindings.js
reset
description: Resets the current bindings to match the default bindings.

name: setDefault
description: Establishes default key bindings and resets the current bindings.

params.name: actions
params.description: A map of actions. Each key must be a key code and each value must be a number.

name: copy
description: Copies the given key bindings, including the default bindings.

name: has
description: Checks if the given key is bound to an action.

return.description: Whether the given key is bound to an action.

name: get
description: Returns the action that is bound to the given key.

return.description: The action, or undefined if the key is not bound to any action.

name: set
description: Binds a key to an action.

return.description: Whether the key bindings existed or not.

name: toJSON
description: Creates a plain representation of this instance.

name: src/settings/PointerSettings.js
hold
description:
Whether the pointer buttons must be held down to have an effect.

This setting only applies when the pointer is locked.

name: lock
description: Whether the pointer should be locked on click events.

name: src/settings/RotationSettings.js
up
description: The up vector. Must be normalized.

name: pivotOffset
description: A pivot offset. Only affects third person orbiting.

name: minAzimuthalAngle
description: The minimum azimuthal angle in radians. Range: [-Math.PI, Math.PI].

name: maxAzimuthalAngle
description: The maximum azimuthal angle in radians. Range: [-Math.PI, Math.PI].

name: minPolarAngle
description: The minimum polar angle in radians. Range: [0, Math.PI].

name: maxPolarAngle
description: The maximum polar angle in radians. Range: [0, Math.PI].

name: invertX
description: Indicates whether the horizontal rotation should be inverted.

name: invertY
description: Indicates whether the vertical rotation should be inverted.

name: src/settings/SensitivitySettings.js

return.description: A URL to the exported settings.

name: ./README.md

content:
{
	"name": "delta-controls",
	"version": "2.1.0",
	"description": "A 3D movement controller.",
	"homepage": "https://github.com/vanruesc/delta-controls",
	"main": "build/delta-controls.js",
	"module": "build/delta-controls.esm.js",
	"sideEffects": false,
	"license": "Zlib",
	"keywords": [
		"movement",
		"translation",
		"rotation",
		"object",
		"controls",
		"keybindings",
		"3d"
	],
	"author": {
		"name": "Raoul van Rüschen",
		"email": "vanruesc@outlook.de"
	},
	"repository": {
		"type": "git",
		"url": "https://github.com/vanruesc/delta-controls.git"
	},
	"bugs": {
		"url": "https://github.com/vanruesc/delta-controls/issues"
	},
	"files": [
		"build"
	],
	"scripts": {
		"ava": "ava",
		"lint": "npm run lint:lib && npm run lint:demo && npm run lint:test",
		"lint:config": "eslint *.js",
		"lint:lib": "eslint src",
		"lint:demo": "eslint demo/src",
		"lint:test": "eslint test",
		"build": "rollup -c",
		"build:production": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build",
		"watch": "rollup -c -w",
		"doc": "rimraf public/docs && esdoc",
		"pretest": "npm run lint && npm run build:production",
		"test": "ava",
		"prepack": "npm test && npm run doc"
	},
	"ava": {
		"failFast": true,
		"files": [
			"test/**/*.js"
		],
		"require": [
			"esm"
		]
	},
	"eslintConfig": {
		"extends": "delta"
	},
	"peerDependencies": {
		"math-ds": ">= 1.0.0 < 2.0.0"
	},
	"devDependencies": {
		"@babel/core": "7.x.x",
		"@babel/preset-env": "7.x.x",
		"@rollup/plugin-node-resolve": "7.x.x",
		"ava": "3.x.x",
		"cross-env": "7.x.x",
		"dat.gui": "0.x.x",
		"esdoc": "1.x.x",
		"esdoc-importpath-plugin": "1.x.x",
		"esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.x.x",
		"eslint": "6.x.x",
		"eslint-config-delta": "1.x.x",
		"esm": "3.x.x",
		"rimraf": "3.x.x",
		"math-ds": "1.x.x",
		"rollup": "1.x.x",
		"rollup-plugin-babel": "4.x.x",
		"rollup-plugin-eslint": "6.x.x",
		"rollup-plugin-terser": "5.x.x",
		"synthetic-event": "1.x.x",
		"three": "0.x.x",
		"three-demo": "3.x.x"
	}
}
name: package.json
